name: Blade Hop 3D — Beat Blade
description:
Enjoy various tracks — from beautiful EDM, DNB and POP songs!

How to play
1. Touch, Hold and Drag to make the hero jump on the tiles.
2. Don’t Miss the Tiles! This is not a tap tap game!
3. Follow the rhythm!
4. Make insane combos!

Game features

* Addictive challenges designed for each song

* Distinct color lighting effect for every track

* One-touch control

* Breathtaking 3D effects

* Various absolutely beautiful and fun songs to relax

* Different backgrounds to truly bring you a new experience every play!

This game will create the whole new experience for music game fans!
